name: Onion & Garlic Bagels

ingredients.name: Easy Peasy Bagel, Pancake & Waffle Mix

preparation: Preheat oven to 375° F. Place Perfect Portion Bagel & Donut Pan on Sheet Pan. Lightly brush bagel pan with oil; set aside.
In a bowl, whisk together flour, garlic, onion, baking powder, and salt. Make a well in centre; add yogurt. Using a fork, mix until combined. Dough will be crumbly.
Knead dough in bowl a few times until it comes together in a ball. Dough should be tacky, but not sticky. Cover and let stand 10 min.
Turn onto floured counter; knead 2–3 times and flatten slightly. If dough is sticky, add more four as needed. Cut into six wedges. Roll into ropes, each about 7" long.
Lay ropes in pan; pinch ends to seal. If desired, brush with egg. Stir together remaining garlic and onion; sprinkle over dough.
Bake in oven until puffy and golden, 15–18 min. Cool; pop out.
